title: Connection problems - can't connect to the server.
body: Retry doesn't help. Restarting the game doesn't help. I was playing before that flawlessly and suddenly that happened. My internet is working.

replies.body:
Could be that some ports are being blocked for some reason that aren't letting you communicate properly with LoL; let's try and manually forward them with the [**steps in our Connection guide over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq8).

Try that out and play in a Custom Game, and get back to me and let me know if the test is successful and you don't have any connection trouble anymore.
